purpose: Facilitate the development, evaluation, and deployment of AI agents in a customizable and controlled manner.
principle: Built on a code-first approach using Python, allowing developers to leverage existing machine learning frameworks and libraries.
reusability: Highly modular with plug-and-play components, supports integration with various AI frameworks and tools.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and community support, potential for breaking changes.
name: adk-docs
description: An open-source, code-first Python toolkit for building, evaluating, and deploying sophisticated AI agents with flexibility and control.
highlight: Provides a comprehensive toolkit for building and deploying AI agents with a focus on flexibility and control.
